topics.body:
So I was watching Hellsing Ultimate last night and there was a scene that came up that bothered me a bit.
[spoiler]The scene in question was after it was revealed that most of the Hellsing operatives had been turned into ghouls. After the ghouls start attacking Seras (The Police Girl) she decides to go batshit and just starts slaughtering them with her bare hands. After she's finished turning them into red goop she looks at the blood on her hands and tries to lick it off. Only to be stopped by Integra. My problem with this is that it's kind of out of character for Ms. Hellsing. Seras knew what she was getting into when she "chose the night" and holding her back from drinking would only make her weaker.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

>woohoo
